name: Spellthief - GBJAM6
description:
A puzzle platformer where you must use your acrobatic thievery skills and trusty grappling hook to navigate compact, dangerous dungeons. Can you make it to the end of all seven rooms with a perfect record? 


Controls:

WASD: Movement, lockpicking & Interaction. 
J: Jumping.
K: Grappling Hook


This was built for GBJAM 6. An updated version with additional rooms, more challenges, story, and additional control schemes is coming soon.


Music/SFX: Sebastian Bender's 8-Bit Blast
